p: When examining the 4’, 6-diamidino-2-phenylindole (DAPI) channel ( Figure 2), it was clear that the 3b- and 3e-treated cells exhibited chromatin changes, karyorrhexis (nuclear fragmentation; yellow arrows), and pyknosis (chromatin condensation; green arrows). We have quantified this effect ( Supplementary Table S1), results, showing that incubation with 3b resulted in an increase of fragmented and condensed chromatin to 34.8 ± 0.3% and 12.6 ± 4.2%, respectively, while 3e elicited 21.2 ± 0.8% and 5.8 ± 0.5%, respectively.
